DAILY_BONUS_DESC.en: Click on a token for a reward!

CODE_WRONG.en:
The code is wrong
Please try again

CODE_USED.en:
The code has already 
been redeemed

PAUSE_EXIT.en:
Are you sure you want to 
return to the main menu?

PAUSE_RESTART.en:
Are you sure you want to 
restart the level?

HELP_MAIN_0.en:
Play story mode and collect memory
sticks to crack Hydra's network

HELP_MAIN_1.en:
Play endless mode to see how
far you can get

HELP_MAIN_2.en:
Get a high-score and try to beat it 
each time you play

HELP_GOALS_0.en:
Check your progress on goals.
Finishing goals earns you extra tokens

HELP_CHARACTER_0.en: Select a character to play with

HELP_CHARACTER_1.en:
Upgrade your character to make them 
faster and stronger

HELP_CHARACTER_2.en:
Tumble Speed will help you to spin faster 
in-air when tumbling

HELP_CHARACTER_3.en:
Token Magnet will help you to attract 
more tokens

HELP_CHARACTER_4.en:
Each character has a different ability. 
Be sure to try them all out!

HELP_MAP_0.en:
This map will show you the way to the 
Hydra's secret bases

HELP_MAP_1.en:
Unlock additional characters as you
progress through the levels

HELP_MAP_2.en:
Collecting all the memory sticks in all 
the levels will crack the Hydra's network

HELP_GENERIC_2_PC.en: Press X key to attack enemies

HELP_GENERIC_3_PC.en: Press C key to use special ability

HELP_GENERIC_4.en:
Collect tokens to upgrade
your characters

HELP_GENERIC_5.en:
Collect memory sticks to crack
Hydra's network

HELP_ENDLESS_0.en: This shows how far you have travelled

HELP_ENDLESS_1.en: This will show you your personal best

QUIT.en: Are you sure you want to quit?

ENDLESS_LOCKED.en:
Please finish {value} levels 
of Story to unlock 
Endless Mode

ENDLESS_UNLOCKED.en:
Endless Mode Unlocked!
Get a hi-score and try 
to beat it each time you play!

COMPLETIONIST_DESCRIPTION.en:
You found
all the
memory sticks!

TUTORIAL_TUMBLE.en:
Hold down jump to tumble 
and earn points

TUTORIAL_TOKEN.en:
Collect tokens 
to upgrade your characters

TUTORIAL_SIGNS.en:
The signs will help you 
find memory sticks

TUTORIAL_ABILITY.en:
Use your special abilities 
to defeat Hydra's henchmen

TIPS_CAPTAIN_AMERICA.en:
Captain America can bash
through enemies with his shield

TIPS_IRON_MAN.en:
Iron Man can fly to avoid enemies 
and reach higher platforms

TIPS_BLACK_WIDOW.en:
Black Widow can roll to dodge
enemies and crawl in tight passages

TIPS_THOR.en:
Thor can shock enemies and disable
electronic devices with the Mjolnir

TIPS_FALCON.en:
Falcon can glide for long 
distances after a jump

TIPS_BLACK_PANTHER.en:
Black Panther can leap and 
move through ceilings

TIPS_HAWKEYE.en:
Hawkeye can shoot arrows 
to defeat enemies and collect items

TIPS_HULK.en:
Hulk can smash through 
enemies and cages

description.en: Tumble Dive – through trapdoors/vents to access new areas
Defensive Shield -  defence against weapons to access areas
Fly and Glide – reaches places far away
Shoots arrows – hit targets for collectibles
Hulk Smash – breaks apart solid objects
Super Rocket Jump – reaches high places
Lightning Hammer – powers or shorts out electrical items

en.title: Frozen Online
en.text: Watch the new Frozen Nothern Lights videos at frozen.disney.co.uk
